metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25666 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: There are 4 places in HistogramCompare() in MagickCore/histogram.c where an integer overflow is possible during simple math calculations. This occurs in the rgb values and `count` value for a color. The patch uses casts to `ssize_t` type for these calculations, instead of `int`. This flaw could impact application reliability in the event that ImageMagick processes a crafted input file. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
